product_description: Clear the way by selecting full or semi-auto on this electric-powered AK-style airsoft rifle from GameFace. Featuring a 375-round magazine, Picatinny rail for your accessories, rechargeable battery and battery charger. Control the skirmish and "Be The Game" with GameFace.

name: Lancer Tactical Gen 2 Hellion MLOK 7" Piactinny Polymer Airsoft M4 AEG Full/Semi-Auto Airsoft Gun (Battery and Charger Included)
short_description: *Quick Change System: The full metal Version 2 gearbox comes with a quick change system, allowing for rapid and effortless spring changes. Easily adjust the FPS to meet any field requirements without the need for complex disassembly.

High-Performance Gearbox: Equipped with ultra-smooth 8mm ball bearings and an 18:1 steel gear ratio, this gearbox ensures reliable and consistent performance. The 18k RPM high torque motor provides impressive power for a serious punch on the battlefield.
MlocK Handguard: The MlocK handguard offers ample rail space, allowing you to mount your favorite picatinny compatible accessories with ease. Customize your setup for enhanced tactical advantage.
Enhanced Range and Accuracy: The polished 6.03mm tightbore inner barrel significantly improves range and accuracy, making every shot count. Range around 150ft-200ft

Full Length Picatinny Rail: The full-length 20mm picatinny rail enables the attachment of various optics, lights, lasers, PEQ boxes, and other picatinny compatible accessories, giving you the versatility to customize your setup.

Durable Nylon Polymer Construction: Constructed with high-quality lightweight Nylon Polymer receivers and rail, this airsoft gun is designed to withstand the toughest battles, ensuring durability and reliability.

Powerful FPS Range: With an FPS range of 370-390, this airsoft rifle offers both high and standard-torque motor options. The high FPS option delivers a serious punch, while the 8mm ball bearing bushings ensure smooth and efficient operation.
*Mid-Cap Magazine: The 140-round mid-cap metal magazine ensures you have ample ammunition for extended periods of gameplay, minimizing the need for winding
*Battery & Charger Included
product_description: Introducing the Lancer Tactical Electric Automatic Airsoft Rifle, a high-performance and reliable weapon perfect for airsoft enthusiasts. This rifle boasts exceptional construction with Nylon Polymer Receivers and Handguard, ensuring durability and lightweight maneuverability during intense gameplay. With versatile firing modes, including Semi-Automatic, Full-Automatic, and Safe, you can adapt your strategy in any situation. The powerful Muzzle Velocity of 370 - 390 FPS with 0.20g BBs guarantees accurate shots at various distances. The Lancer Tactical Airsoft Rifle features a Full Metal Version 2 Gearbox, delivering superior performance and longevity. For convenience, the package includes a recommended 9.6v NiMH Nunchuck Battery and charger, so you can start playing right away. Equipped with a 140 Round (mid-Cap) magazine, you'll have enough ammo to dominate the battlefield. The adjustable Hop-Up (Rotary Style) allows you to fine-tune your shots for enhanced precision. Designed with comfort in mind, the 7-inch Handguard length provides a steady grip, ensuring precise control during rapid movements. The 6.03mm Inner Barrel Bore further enhances accuracy and consistency. This Lancer Tactical Airsoft Rifle has a compact design, with a rifle length ranging from 24.5 to 28 inches (Stock Retracted / Extended). Its lightweight build, weighing just 4.75 lbs, minimizes fatigue, making it an ideal choice for extended gaming sessions. Dressed in a sleek black/tan color, this airsoft rifle exudes a tactical and professional appearance. Whether you're a seasoned player or a beginner, the Lancer Tactical Electric Automatic Airsoft Rifle is an excellent choice for unmatched performance and a thrilling airsoft experience.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H ‎34.6 x 12 x 3.9 inches

Warranty Description ‎Lancer Tactical offers a one-year manufacturer's warranty that covers repairs only. Please note that this warranty does not include coverage for shipping costs. To avail of the warranty, kindly register your product on Lancer Tactical's platform. It's important to note that any modifications made to the product will void the warranty.
Included Components ‎1x Rifle 1x Magazine 1x Bag of Sample BBs 1x Battery 1x Charger 1x Patch 1x Manual

name: Barra Airguns 400e Gen 2 Full Auto Battery-Powered BB Gun Kit, Includes LiPo Battery and Charger, Fully Automatic Electric BB Rifle - 430 to 440 FPS
short_description: FULL AUTOMATIC - More than 100X cheaper to operate than a full auto CO2 air rifle. Constructed with durable polymer materials, offering a rugged yet lightweight frame for easy handling.

BATTERY POWERED - Using a 3S (11.1V) LiPo battery you can expect over 1000 shots per battery charge! Spend your time actually shooting rather than fumbling with CO2 cartridges. Includes 50 round magazine and speed loader.
SNIPER LIKE ACCURACY AND SPEED - Highly accurate BB guns featuring patent pending technology. Maintain velocities between 430-440 fps . Rate of fire 500-600 RPM for tactical, high speed fun!
POWERED BY ELECTRICITY - The first and only production fully automatic BB gun powered completely by electricity. Uses 11.1V Lithium Polymer (LiPo) battery commonly used in RC toys.

4X LONGER EXPERIENCE - This fully automatic bb gun has 4X longer shooting than comparable fully automatic CO2 rifles before needing a mag change. Full Auto rate of fire is 500-600 rounds per minute, which gets you over 5 seconds on full-auto.
This product is protected by U.S. Patent No. 12305954. Barra Airguns actively enforces its intellectual property rights.
